<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Domain Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=295) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 125 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
one or more domain spells

</column>

---

Your devotion to your deity’s domains grows greater, and so does the power granted to you. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

<title level="2">Domain Focus leads to...</title>
[Domain Wellspring](/Feats.aspx?ID=305)
name: Domain Focus
